content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mining and Storage at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill (position x=43.0, y=-82.0) with a drop position at (x=42.5, y=-83.5)
- Furnace (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) 
- Burner Inserter (position x=43.5, y=-80.5) that picks up items from the chest at (x=44.5, y=-81.5) and drops them into the chest at (x=43.5, y=-79.5)
- Chests at positions (x=42.5, y=-83.5), (x=43.5, y=-79.5), (x=44.5, y=-81.5), and (x=45.5, y=-80.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when mining with a full chest
- Ensure the chest at the drop position is not full before mining to avoid stopping the mining process.
### Errors when inventory is missing required items
- Make sure to have the required items, such as iron ore, in the inventory before attempting to use them.
### Errors when extracting items from a chest
- Ensure the chest is not empty and has the items to be extracted before attempting extraction.
